actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: Concurrent resolution relating to the awarding of the Purple Heart to members of the Armed Forces interred in the Tomb of the Unknowns at Arlington National Cemetery.

summary.text: Calls upon the Secretaries of the military departments concerned to award the Purple Heart to members of the Armed Forces interred in the Tomb of the Unknowns at Arlington National Cemetery.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution relating to the awarding of the Purple Heart to members of the Armed Forces interred in the Tomb of the Unknowns at Arlington National Cemetery.
